alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Eastern Franklin; Eastern Hampden; Eastern Hampshire; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex; Western Franklin; Western Hampden; Western Hampshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 17 at 3:54PM EST until February 18 at 9:00AM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 9 AM EST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Hartford CT County. In Massachusetts, Western Franklin MA, Eastern Franklin MA, Northern Worcester MA, Western Hampshire MA, Western Hampden MA, Eastern Hampshire MA, Eastern Hampden MA and Northern Middlesex MA Counties. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 9 AM EST Friday. Strongest winds roughly from 1 AM to 7 AM. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
